name: 1 Minute Bullet Hell
description:
I made this game as the product of a Udemy course I developed, but it turned out to be really fun to play. If you want to check out the course, where I give out all my juicy gameplay secrets, you can do so here. The game lasts around a minute if you don't die.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot: J

Enjoy this tiny game :)
